Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-5917 affecting package cmake for versions less than 3.30.3-8
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-5917 affecting package cmake for versions less than 3.30.3-8. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package cmake is earlier than 3.30.3-8, affected by CVE-2025-5917
